verses.roman:
eta bali' nāce, gāya, huṅkāra gambhīra
kṣaṇeke vasilā ācārya haiñā susthira

synonyms: eta bali'-saying this; nāce—dances; gāya—sings; huṅkāra—loud vibrations; gambhīra—deep; kṣaṇeke—in a moment; vasilā—sits down; ācārya—Advaita Ācārya; haiñā su-sthira—being very patient.
translation: Saying this, Advaita Prabhu dances and loudly sings. Then at the next moment He quietly sits down.
